title: Mini-Ep 147: Another Day In Quaradise
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 147: Another Day In Quaradise
itunes:subtitle: Kate sprains her ankle again and Doree struggles with being home all the time. Then, listeners weigh in about reusable makeup pads, what products they love and keep coming back to, and why it’s so darn hard to make friends as an adult.Activity of th...
description:
Kate sprains her ankle again and Doree struggles with being home all the time. Then, listeners weigh in about reusable makeup pads, what products they love and keep coming back to, and why it’s so darn hard to make friends as an adult.


Activity of the Day: Listen to an album that brought you joy when you were a teenager. 


Follow us on Twitter and Instagram and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).

To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. 


Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • IN VOGUE: THE 1990s - Listen and subscribe to In Vogue: The 1990s wherever you listen to podcasts. 
  • MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass. 
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today. 
  • FRAMEBRIDGE - Go to Framebridge.com and use promo code FOREVER35 to save an additional 15% off your first order. 
  • SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Real-life isn’t always perfect, but with Signature Hardware it is beautiful. Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.


Theme Music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
